pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo attano bhaṇḍakaṁ apassantiyo caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.5_0: “ahameva nūna corī, ahameva nūna alajjinī, yā ayyāyo attano bhaṇḍakaṁ apassantiyo tā maṁ evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.7_0: Sacāhaṁ, ayye, tumhākaṁ bhaṇḍakaṁ gaṇhāmi, assamaṇī homi, brahmacariyā cavāmi, nirayaṁ upapajjāmi;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.8_0: yā pana maṁ abhūtena evamāha sāpi assamaṇī hotu, brahmacariyā cavatu, nirayaṁ upapajjatū”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.9_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.10_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.11_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.14_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.16_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.17.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṁ vā paraṁ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.1.9_0: Nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.1_0: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.2_0: Upasampannāya vematikā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.3_0: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.4_0: Tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena vā abhisapati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
